alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 8:01PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow shower will affect Northeastern Rock island...Whiteside... Eastern Henry and Northwestern Bureau counties through 900 PM CST... At 800 PM CST, a snow shower was located near Erie, or 7 miles southwest of Morrison, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibilities less than a half of a mile in a brief snow shower. SOURCE...Radar indicated snow intensity. IMPACTS...Difficulty seeing while driving. Locations impacted include... Morrison, Geneseo, Prophetstown, Erie, Atkinson, Sheffield, Annawan, Tampico, Lyndon, Hooppole, Deer Grove, Union Grove, Fenton, Hillsdale, Yorktown, Round Grove, Manlius, Mineral, New Bedford and Portland Corners. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 21 and 46. Interstate 88 between mile markers 8 and 33. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
